original: @134b rma 'byor bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags /
analyzed: @134b rma 'byor bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags /

translated: Homage to Noble Mañjuśrī.🔽Oṃ upa upa

original: h'um phat/ sha ma sh'an tim ku ru sv'ah'a /
analyzed: h'um phat/ sha ma sh'an tim ku ru sv'ah'a /

original: lan gsum brjod de rma la mchil ma byugs na rdos phog pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang; rtsa chad pa dang / klad pa chag pa rnams sos par byed do //
analyzed: lan gsum brjod de rma la mchil ma byugs na rdos phog pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang; rtsa chad pa dang / klad pa chag pa rnams sos par byed do //
translated: If one recites this three times and applies saliva to a wound, it will heal wounds from blows, stabbings, severed veins, and concussions.

original: rma 'byor par byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rma 'byor par byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī for Causing Healing is complete.
